caption:
The weekend is here, so you know what that means—deep conditioning time! 🧖🏽‍♀️✨ To get the most out of your deep conditioner, we recommend applying heat and covering your hair with a plastic cap.

Plastic bag or shower cap? Which team are you? 🛍️🛁

Depending on your hair needs, we’ve got you covered:
1️⃣ Banana Nut & Avocado Deep Treatment for moisture-starved strands that need a hydration boost. 🍌🥑
2️⃣ Honey Ginger Protein Deep Treatment for dry, damaged, or breaking hair that needs strengthening. 🍯🌿

Healthy hair starts with the right treatment! Shop now at kurleebelle.com 🛒💻
